body:
Add version 4.12.6, 5.0.3

I think, the preferred was there to keep version 4.
But that's why we have spack, because people can install whatever version they want.
And root has a properly versioned dependency.

@vvolkl Can you comment on the preferred setting? You added it in #18101

cc: @ajkotobi
title: xrootd: Add version 4.12.6, 5.0.3; drop preferred
